lol, kashmiri, so i think u are just anti-indian, coz that reporter wrote all incidence against indian defence forces.
1st of all kashmir is not disputed, its and indian state. 2nd of all the kashmiris help pakis to terrorise india. 3rd all hindus have been killed or driven away frm kashmir. 4rth the army guys are away from their family into that harsh cold, and kashmiris support terrorists, so wht do u expect, amry personals to kiss u for supporting terrorists?

Ofcourse it's never been disputed in the eyes of India - for them it's a rightful state of theirs, acceeded to them by the Hindu regional prince of Kashmir at the time of the partition.

But this Prince as well as you Hindus have forgotten one thing. Did the Muslims agree??? The majority of the people of Kashmir were Muslim at that time and they still are right now, so by the laws of the partition back then, Kashmir should be part of Pakistan.

2nd.) Not all Kashmiris are pro Pakistan, many just want an independent state from either IOK or POK. And another thing. Fighting for independence or for freedom is supposed to be terrorism??? Is that what our ancestors were against the British? Terrorists??

3.) Yep, Hindus and Sikhs are diverted away from Kashmir, just like Punjabis are diverted away from the Northern areas in Pakistan and are not allow to settle or buy land there. 

4.) This is a difficult one - I'm not even going to try and work this out. The Indian gov's really pathetic when it comes to dealing with Kashmir, they think they can use brute force, rape and repression against the Kashmiris to force them to become Indian citizens. So far they've kept the Kashmiris at bay....thanks to their larger forces but I doubt they will ever succeed in turning Kashmir into a safe Indian state, not unless they go about massmurdering and exterminating all the Muslims there - I'm sure your BJP party would love that.
